sql.desc: 获取指定类型的全部字典
sql.body: SELECT kv.id AS 'dictId', kv.dict_type AS 'type', kv.field_value AS 'value', kv.field_name AS 'name', kv.field_index AS 'index', kv.field_desc AS 'desc', <@crud_fixed_select alias="kv" /> FROM ${tableName} AS kv WHERE kv.delete_flag = 0 AND kv.dict_type = :type AND kv.tenant_id IN (-1,${TENANT_ID}) ORDER BY kv.field_index

INSERT INTO DICT_KV_DATA (id, dict_type, field_value, field_name, field_index, field_desc, tenant_id, creator, createTime) VALUES (:id, :type, :value, :name, :index, :desc, :tenantId, :creator, NOW())
UPDATE DICT_KV_DATA SET field_name = :name, field_index = :index, field_desc = :desc, editor = :editor, editTime = NOW() WHERE id = :id AND kv.tenant_id = :TENANT_ID
